title: Countries with the lowest inflation rate 2019
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Inflation rate compared to previous year for 20 number of Countrys.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is appeared to be the highest at Country Eritrea and lowest at Country Panama.
The difference of Inflation rate compared to previous year between the highest and lowest Country is 27.59.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Inflation rate compared to previous year for 20 number of Countrys.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is highest at Country Eritrea and lowest at Country Panama.
The second highest Inflation rate compared to previous year is appeared to be the Country Guinea-Bissau.
The highest Country Eritrea has 27.59 more Inflation rate compared to previous year than the lowest Country Panama.
Country Eritrea is higher than any other Countrys with value 27.6, followed by Guinea-Bissau, and United Arab Emirates. Down to Country Panama with the lowest value 0.01.
Country Switzerland, and Marshall Islands have a similar Inflation rate compared to previous year that is 0.57.
The Country Eritrea tends to be 13.99 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 39.47.
